name: Ext_R4_DeviceDefinition_physicalCharacteristics
title: Cross-version Extension for R4.DeviceDefinition.physicalCharacteristics for use in FHIR R5
description: This cross-version extension represents DeviceDefinition.physicalCharacteristics from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/DeviceDefinition|4.0.1 for use in FHIR R5.

element.short: Dimensions, color etc.
element.definition: `DeviceDefinition.physicalCharacteristics` has no related element in R5:DeviceDefinition

element.short: Where applicable, the height can be specified using a numerical value and its unit of measurement The unit of measurement shall be specified in accordance with ISO 11240 and the resulting terminology The symbol and the symbol identifier shall be used
element.definition: `DeviceDefinition.physicalCharacteristics` has no related element in R5:DeviceDefinition
